Description: This session will address recent advances in cancer risk stratification and the development of novel risk reduction strategies from the preclinical to clinical settings. Topics include strategies to maximize efficient use of data and methods to improve the benefit to harm ratio for screening and prevention programs. The design of innovative risk stratification approaches with efficient clinical application as a central focus will be presented. Novel preclinical preventive interventions with potential for translation will be discussed. Finally, the development of risk-adapted clinical lifestyle intervention strategies will be presented.
Location: New Orleans Theater B, Convention Center

Title: Precision Strategies for Cancer Risk Reduction
